project.name: jsr166
project.description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Build file for JSR-166
Usage: ant [target]
See http://gee.cs.oswego.edu/dl/concurrency-interest/index.html for more details.
User-specific settings are read from user.properties. See user.properties.sample for an explanation of some useful settings.
The repository contains all dependencies except for ant and the JDK itself. Because the JDK version matters and because different targets require different JDKs, we assume that users have created a hierarchy containing: $HOME/jdk/jdk8 $HOME/jdk/jdk9 $HOME/jdk/jdk10 $HOME/jdk/jdk11 $HOME/jdk/jdk12 where each of the above is a JDK or a symlink to same, and $HOME/jdk/src/jdk8 $HOME/jdk/src/jdk9 $HOME/jdk/src/jdk10 $HOME/jdk/src/jdk11 $HOME/jdk/src/jdk12 where each of the above is a complete JDK source tree (e.g. mercurial forest) or a symlink to same.
Alternatively, define ant variables thus: ant -Djdk$N.home=... -Djdk$N.src.home=... for $N in 8 9 10 ...
As of 2016-03, the sources in src/main are for jdk9+ only. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------

target.name: dists
target.description: Builds all public jars and docs

target.name: compile
target.description: Compiles src/main sources to build dir

target.name: jar
target.description: Builds library jar for src/main from compiled sources

target.name: docs
target.description: Builds javadocs for src/main to dist dir

target.name: dist
target.description: Puts all distributable products in single hierarchy

target.name: clean
target.description: Removes all build products

target.name: dist-clean
target.description: Removes all build and distribution products

target.name: tck
target.description: Runs tck tests for src/main directly

target.name: tck-parallelism-1
target.description: Runs tck with common pool parallelism 1

target.name: tck-parallelism-0
target.description: Runs tck with common pool parallelism 0

target.name: tck-security-manager
target.description: Runs tck with a security manager

target.name: jtreg
target.description: Runs jtreg tests for src/main using the jtreg ant task

target.name: test
target.description: Runs tck and jtreg tests for src/main

target.name: test-version-permutations
target.depends: test9, test10, test11, test12, test9-11, test9-12, clean, test, docs

target.name: compile-test-loops
target.description: Compiles all the perf tests in src/test/loops

target.name: 4jdk8compile
target.description: Compiles src/jdk8 sources, targeting jdk8

target.name: 4jdk8doclint
target.description: Finds doclint warnings

target.name: 4jdk8jar
target.description: Builds library jar from compiled sources

target.name: 4jdk8-tck
target.description: Runs tck tests for jsr166-4jdk8 directly

target.name: 4jdk8-jtreg
target.description: Runs jtreg tests for jsr166-4jdk8 using the jtreg ant task

target.name: 4jdk8-test
target.description: Runs tck and jtreg tests for jsr166-4jdk8

target.name: 4jdk8docs
target.description: Builds javadocs for src/jdk8 to dist dir

target.name: 4jdk8dist
target.description: Puts all distributable products in single hierarchy

target.name: 4jdk8clean

target.name: errorprone
target.description: Run errorprone over jsr166 source code (experimental)

target.name: errorprone-jtreg
target.description: Run errorprone over jtreg tests (experimental)

target.name: guava-tests
target.description: Guava tests run against jsr166 collections
